name: De Ape Steppa
description:
Guide your rampaging ape to freedom, destroying as many vehicles as you can all whilst steppin' to a kickin' beat!!

Controls
Strafe left and right = A & D or Arrow keys
Jump = Space
Swipe = Insert or 0 on Number Keyboard with Num Lock off.

De Ape Steppa is group project where the music audio track determined the creative nature, feel and tone of the game. Our goal was to accentuate and highlight the mad beats through the use of the apes interactions as well as visual clues.
